channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-18517] Vectorization: Fix VectorMapOperator to accept VRBs and check vectorized flag correctly to support LLAP Caching
item.description:
LLAP is able to deserialize and cache data from an input format (e.g. TextInputFormat) and will deliver that cached data to VectorMapOperator as VRBs.

Symptoms:

   BinaryComparable -> VectorizedRowBatch ClassCastException

   Text -> VectorizedRowBatch ClassCastException
item.summary: Vectorization: Fix VectorMapOperator to accept VRBs and check vectorized flag correctly to support LLAP Caching

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
LGTM - +1

Left a comment on RB about adding a debug log for the row->vrb switch (for the eventual qtest based bug).

-1 overall
